title: So, You Think You Can Hip-Hop
description: Julie, Lucy and Alia are BFF's who share one passion: dance! Between programs in ballet and modern dance, they also slip in classes on many other styles including hip-hop, a class run by the hunk KT, who's got all three competing for his attention. As they prepare for the ballet "Sleeping Beauty," they'd love to see him play Prince Charming. Any girl with a love for dance and taking classes will find this gag-filled series irresistible!
author: BéKa
